summary: Retexture of armor and weapons to be a gold color and have better stats
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new armor and weapons into the game using the same models but with a gold retexture. Currently there are retextures for all steel armor and weapons and elven armor and weapons. These can be crafted under their appropriate skill for smithing. I will be updating this as I complete more armor/weapons. This is my first mod so any comments/feedback will be appreciated ^_^

First Update:

Alright guys, finally got around do doing some more retexturing for this and I finished the Daedric set which is available now. The daedric can be crafted with a new crafting material I added called Daedric Gold. This can be crafted at the smelter with a daedric heart and a gold ingot. I\'ll try to get more sets done as time allows but I hope you like what I have so far.
author: GuildedDagger
